website_summaries.verdict: The outdoor community found the Berghaus FT18 GTX comfortable and light, two crucial requirements for a memorable day hiking trip. The footwear was also commended for its waterproofness and grip on challenging terrain. On the other hand, the shoe’s narrow fit wasn’t for everyone. All in all, the FT18 GTX from Berghaus offers the required performance to day hikers, thanks to its positive set of qualities.
pros: A significant percentage of reviewers said that the Berghaus FT18 GTX was a comfortable piece of gear
The majority appreciated the lightness of this low-cut hiking shoe
Scores of day hikers lauded its effective waterproof liner
A handful of outdoor enthusiasts raved about the grippy outsole of this Berghaus product
Several buyers reported that the FT18 GTX hardly had any break-in time
This footgear provided sufficient heel support, as testified by the minority
cons: A few customers were disappointed with the Berghaus FT18 GTX’s narrow fit
Some lamented the absence of a wide version of this shoe

customer_reviews.title: No grip after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Started well, very comfortable and very stable across all terrain. 6 months later with not much use there is no grip left. In the wet they are pretty dangerous with no grip whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Rios

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, they need time to 'break in'
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this shoe is what you would expect from a Berghaus product, full retail price is too expensive though. Initially they felt tight and narrow with poor grip but after a week of constant wearing in, they have settled into a comfortable fit and feel a lot more flexible and stable. They are a very breathable lightweight hiking shoe which offers minimal support with questionable grip in wet conditions so would definitely be more suitable for everyday use rather than a long haul trek.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Same shoe different price. (update) Wrong colour & size
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes but they were half a size too small. I went to exchange for the next size up and they were £15 more expensive!! This made them out of my budget which is a shame. (update) So I decided to buy the black pair in a size 9 (the half size up as previously mentioned.) They arrived in a box stating black and size 9. When I opened the box the pair were grey, size 8.5!! Probably the same shoe as I previously bought just put in a different box!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lee

customer_reviews.title: Didnt like anything about them
customer_reviews.text: To slim fitting & just nothing to really like about them for me; but well made as you would expect of Berghaus but for me going away from what they excel at in order to reach a possible younger market imho. Will suit people so don't be put off by my personal appraisal; each to their own. I ended up with Fellmasters.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. N. Robins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these, they fit well, but maybe not suitable for people with wide feet, as the shoes are somewhat on the narrow side. They repel water really well and the Vibram soles are grippy on rough terrain and in wet conditions. Very light, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kleiner Junge

customer_reviews.title: Good support but not so wide fitting
customer_reviews.text: They have good support in the sole and they're light in weight. Attractive looking shoe and much better than trainers. They're supposed to be wide fitting but they don't feel like it. I've had to break them in a quite a bit. I'm a cameraman so I've bought them for trekking across the Pyrenees in the summer and filming across Africa.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They keep the feet warm and dry.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable, though it should be said that the cut is slightly slimmer than normal. They keep the feet warm and dry in November weather. Because they are black I can wear them also at the office when I don't expect to meet anybody external.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were a great fit straight out of the box , no rubbing or pinching etc and also they feel very light on your feet . Very good quality as well .
customer_reviews.author: SPEEDY

customer_reviews.title: Just the best walking / every day / do anything shoes
customer_reviews.text: Always get positive comments about these shoes. Supremely comfortable for every day all day use
customer_reviews.author: Hermann Hesse

customer_reviews.title: Issues with sole
customer_reviews.text: Initially I loved the shoes but having worn them for some time,I find I can feel every stone on the road,leading me to have to choose when it is practical to wear them. There are many positives with the shoes. However the sole issue spoils it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent footwear! Walked 22mile in a day and they felt fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: LMG

customer_reviews.title: Tread wears out very fast
customer_reviews.text: We are in April now and I did not wear these in the worst winter weather. The sole is too soft, there is very little grip left, I cannot wear these in anything other than dry conditions now. Only 6 months old, with 3 months use! Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tonja I. Fritz-Johnson

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable straight out of the box, delivery was days ahead of schedule, water just rolls off
customer_reviews.author: Graham C.

customer_reviews.title: REALLY POOR SHOE GRIP
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe but really poor shoe grip on roads, footpaths & flat surfaces. This should have been highlighted by Berghaus before accepting sales order from Amazon trusted customers
customer_reviews.author: Conor Molloy

customer_reviews.title: good shoes
customer_reviews.text: good quality shoes, fit well and they keep my feet dry.
customer_reviews.author: stephen t smith

customer_reviews.title: Width perfect. I am sure size 6
customer_reviews.text: Slightly large length wise. Width perfect. I am sure size 6.5 might have been slightly tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent walking shoe, great value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Light, durable and waterproof. Perfect for low level hikes and dog walking.
customer_reviews.author: B.G.  Wolverhampton

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Been out in a torrential downpour and remained dry if only a bit sweaty in the toe area!
customer_reviews.author: Neil Clarkson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Squeaky when walking. Not as breathable as North Face or as comfy.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Suit narrower feet, but excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, I have large flat feet - so although the length was correct, they are a tight fit. If you've got normal/narrow feed, you'll love them. They are quite rigid, with almost no flex between heel and sole. This is a good thing, of course, for fast walking over variable terrain. They are clearly well designed, excellent grip, smart, robust and well made. Very comfortable and padded, with the super grip on the soles should be better than trainers on ice and snow - e.g. for commuting. The colours are restrained, ideal for both men and women.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Tea

customer_reviews.title: Great for every day use
customer_reviews.text: Nice for everyday wear for walking to and from work. They are comfortable but supportive, and the soles are tough and hard wearing. After a few months of regular wear, they still smell fairly fresh. The laces are tough and long enough to tie securely.
customer_reviews.author: McColey

product_meta.title: Berghaus Men's Ft18 Gore-tex Waterproof Walking Shoes
product_meta.description: You’ll be hiking with ease in these high performance, super light shoes. Built for agility and maximum grip, the Ft18 gtx is a fantastic fast hike shoe with well targeted support and comfort. Dry feet will keep you focused on your challenge thanks to the gore-tex® waterproof membrane. While super cushioning soles are matched by hardwearing, non-tearing uppers that are so flexible they won't get in the way of a gruelling day facing the elements. Just the way to spend a weekend
feature_bullets: Opti-stud superior grip soles for all terrains
Vibram outsole provides durability and traction
